description: An HTML page implementing a database visualizer UI with embedded CSS and JavaScript for fetching and displaying database and table data dynamically.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches list of available databases from server API and populates sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes database list including re-fetching data from server.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Toggles the display of tables for a selected database and loads table list.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches tables for a specific database from server API.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches data for a selected table and displays it in the main content area.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates HTML table from data array and injects into DOM.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders a table cell based on data type and size, with support for expansion.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Handles expanding or collapsing lengthy or object cell content.
